items.sentence: It\'s difficult to understand what Tom means.

It\'s easy to understand why people like Tom.
I don\'t think you should tell Tom the truth.
I don\'t think you should trust Tom too much.
I don\'t understand what could have happened.
I don\'t understand what this sentence means.
I don\'t want Tom to go to Boston without me.
Tom was supposed to do that without any help.
Tom was the one who showed me how to do that.
Tom was the one who taught Mary how to drive.
Let me give you a lift as far as the station.
We took it for granted that he would join us.
This area is known for its beautiful scenery.
This case might not get resolved for a while.
Tom was muttering something under his breath.
Tom was only thirteen years old at that time.
Tom was quite good-looking when he was young.
Tom was the first one to arrive this morning.
Tom made a promise he didn\'t intend to keep.
